code:
sequenceDiagram
    participant TG as Telegram
    participant Web as Webhook Server (Infra_RedisCache)
    participant App as UseCase: EvaluateMsg
    participant LLM as LLM Client
    participant MCP as MCP Client

    TG->>Web: POST /webhook (Infra_WorkerNode)
    Web->>App: HandleUpdate(Infra_RedisCache)
    App->>App: Gate (Infra_WorkerNode)
    App->>App: RateLimit & Moderation check
    alt Engine = LLM
        App->>LLM: Analyze(Infra_RedisCache)
        LLM-->>App: summary/eval
    else Engine = MCP
        App->>MCP: call tools (Infra_RedisCache)
        MCP-->>App: tool results
    else Engine = Hybrid
        App->>MCP: context snippets
        MCP-->>App: evidence
        App->>LLM: Synthesize(Infra_IngressController)
        LLM-->>App: final answer
    end
    App-->>Web: reply text
    Web-->>TG: sendMessage
